overview:
Co-founder of TOA Technologies, Irad Carmi is the architect and visionary behind TOAâ€™s self-learning predictive technology.

An avid early adopter and renaissance man, Mr. Carmi has taken Software-as-a-Service to a new level by introducing it to enterprise-grade companies with mission-critical functions. He has fifteen years experience designing and implementing software solutions in a broad range of roles and environments. Prior to founding TOA with Yuval Brisker, Mr. Carmi was a Systems Architect at MaxBill Inc., an international Telecom Billing software vendor based in Israel. An accomplished professional classical musician before becoming a technologist, Mr. Carmi has performed as principal flutist with orchestras worldwide. Mr. Carmi has a Masters of Music degree from the Cleveland Institute of Music, and has recorded and appeared live at Carnegie Hall as well as throughout North America, Europe and Israel.
